name: EditUserAppKey
description:
Edit an application key owned by the current user.

Use this tool to modify an existing application key for the current user. This is useful when you need to update permissions or other details associated with your application keys.

parameters.name: application_key_id
parameters.description: The ID of the application key to be edited. Must be a valid string ID.

value_schema.description: The ID of the application key.

parameters.name: app_key_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the application key to be edited.

parameters.name: application_key_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type for the application key. Use the value 'application_keys'.

parameters.name: application_key_name
parameters.description: New name for the application key.

parameters.name: application_key_scopes
parameters.description: List of scopes to grant the application key. Each scope is a string defining permissions.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: app_key_id
parameters.description: The ID of the application key.

value_schema.description: The ID of the application key.

parameters.name: data.attributes.scopes
parameters.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.
